articles.author: Nikil Saval
articles.title: The Curious Case of the U.S. Government’s Influence on 20th-Century Design
articles.description: Known for its intelligence-gathering operations during World War II, the O.S.S. also helped shape the look of modern life.
articles.content: But while the O.S.S. is known for its intelligence-gathering operations and its dissemination of propaganda in enemy territory, its perhaps least heralded legacy is in the field of design. Crucially, the organization had its own dedicated design branch rename… [+4010 chars]

articles.title: DealBook: Sycophants and ‘General Weirdness’ at SoftBank Vision Fund
articles.description: A venture capital firm known for making huge bets on Silicon Valley ventures has a toxic culture and an exceptionally high tolerance for risk, a report says.
articles.content:
Integrating the companies could take many months, including the process of choosing a name for the new company.
